name: Super Magic Elemage
description:
A lost and unfinished Gameboy game, restored to be played on PC.

Made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2022.

Controls - 
WASD - move
Control - Select Spell
Left Click - Fire Spell
Right Click - Interact
Escape - Start/Pause

Made by https://itch.io/profile/doublec & https://itch.io/profile/evilkookey
